name: Customized Vectras VM Image
summary: A CVBI file is a customized virtual machine ( VM ) image used by Vectras VM, an Android app that allows users to run virtual machines on mobile devices. It stores a preconfigured virtual machine, which may include an operating system, applications, and file system data. Vectras VM reads the contents of a CVBI file to set up and launch a virtual environment on an Android device.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
